SL
TRANSLATION.
You and I are associates. This village and this country are yours. I shall do your bidding. We are of the same age. We shall live in company. Get up, eat and see my village and my street. I am the ghasi of Settaguda and Barmaguda villages. I have come to beg of you. Give me rice.
